description: Try our easy to follow Seed & Carrot Pesto recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pesto,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Egg free,Low sugar,Halal,High fibre,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan
name: Seed & Carrot Pesto Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup extra virgin olive oil, plus extra

recipeInstructions.text: In a food processor combine seeds, carrot, coriander, parsley, zest, lemon juice, garlic and cumin. Process to a rough paste. Add oil and 1/3 cup water. Process until smooth. Season to taste. Transfer to a jar and cover in a thin layer of extra oil. Seal jar and refrigerate until ready to use.
